Package com.ninjaguild.dragoneggdrop.versions

Interface DragonBattle

  • public interface DragonBattle
    Represents a dragon battle in the End worlds.
    Author:
    Parker Hawke - 2008Choco

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      org.bukkit.entity.EnderDragon getEnderDragon()
      Get the associated EnderDragon participating in this battle.
      org.bukkit.Location getEndPortalLocation()
      Get the Location of the end portal to the overworld.
      void resetBattleState()
      Reset the end world's battle state.
      void respawnEnderDragon()
      Set the state of the battle to its respawn state, and restart the battle once again.
      boolean setBossBarStyle​(org.bukkit.boss.BarStyle style, org.bukkit.boss.BarColor colour)
      Set the style and colour of the boss bar.
      void setBossBarTitle​(String title)
      Set the title of the boss bar to a specific name.

    • Method Detail

      • setBossBarTitle

        void setBossBarTitle​(String title)
        Set the title of the boss bar to a specific name.
        Parameters:
        title - the title to set

      • setBossBarStyle

        boolean setBossBarStyle​(org.bukkit.boss.BarStyle style,
                        org.bukkit.boss.BarColor colour)
        Set the style and colour of the boss bar.
        Parameters:
        style - the style of the boss bar
        colour - the colour of the boss bar
        Returns:
        true if the style change was successful

      • getEnderDragon

        org.bukkit.entity.EnderDragon getEnderDragon()
        Get the associated EnderDragon participating in this battle.
        Returns:
        the dragon

      • respawnEnderDragon

        void respawnEnderDragon()
        Set the state of the battle to its respawn state, and restart the battle once again.

      • getEndPortalLocation

        org.bukkit.Location getEndPortalLocation()
        Get the Location of the end portal to the overworld.
        Returns:
        the portal location

      • resetBattleState

        void resetBattleState()
        Reset the end world's battle state.
        NOTE: This is to be used internally and is for emergency cases ONLY. Mojang's code breaks rather frequently when attempting to respawn the dragon and will occasionally prevent dragons from spawning at all.
